Text: RE Baseball TriviaHeres my attempt No reference books or web searches were used in the preparation of this email Afterward I researched it and found out how miserable I did Here is the link Kamp it looks like there might be two for the B category as well Sorry you didnt make it awardsawmvpshtml Hope youre all doing well GO YANKS Claff There has been an MVP who reveived the award two years in a row at each position center field has two including at pitcher Name them I will share the answers in a future email Im thinking Bert or DiLeo are the only ones who have half a chance at this one Prove me wrong Pitcher Claffey Jim Roger Clemens CatcherClaffey Jim Yogi Berra this is a lock First Base no it was not Rich KampmannClaffey Jim I was gonna guess you How about Gehrig Carew Second BaseClaffey Jim I havent a clue but will stab at Joe Morgan only because I liked that thing he did with his armpit when he batted My brothers and I learned to make the farting noise with our arms from him Third BaseClaffey Jim Mike Schmidt No doubt about this one Short StopClaffey Jim Robin Yount Left FieldClaffey Jim Mickey Mantle Center FieldClaffey Jim Joe Dimaggio and Dale Murphy I had help on Murphy from some Braves fans Right FieldClaffey Jim Roger Maris Do You Yahoo NEW from Yahoo GeoCities quick and easy web site hosting mailustagpsinfo just month
